reviewText: the movie was great and I enjoyed each episode.
Good series one of my favorite to watch. Shipping not so much upper corner was broken but blue ray disc was not damaged so I guess I could live with a broken case.
This anime was ok. The artwork was fair. As far as the story. It could be better. They try to make a 12 episode but does not really work. It's to short. In short, it not really worth get it!
Hilarious Anime for a comedy lover Otaku and supporting the franchise rather downloading and pirating online.
One of my favorite anime's; just perfectly happy and hilarious. The equivalent of eating your favorite candy.
To much of the same, still the Blue Ray is packed with extras
